name: io.github.sanna-ai/sanna
title: Sanna
description: Reasoning integrity and AI governance layer with cryptographic provenance

tools.name: sanna_verify_receipt
tools.description: Verify a Sanna reasoning receipt offline. Validates schema, fingerprint, content hashes, and status consistency. Returns structured verification result.

tools.name: sanna_generate_receipt
tools.description: Generate a portable reasoning receipt from query, context, and response. When a signed constitution is provided, invariants drive C1-C5 coherence checks at configurable enforcement levels (halt/warn/log).

tools.name: sanna_list_checks
tools.description: List all C1-C5 coherence checks with descriptions, invariant mappings, and default enforcement levels.

tools.name: sanna_evaluate_action
tools.description: Evaluate whether an action is permitted under a constitution's authority boundaries. Returns allow, halt, or escalate with the matching rule and optional escalation target.
